dimensions.name: Git Forensic Analysis
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Run 'git log --oneline --reverse' on the cloned repository. Count commits, check progression story, extract messages and timestamps.
dimensions.success_pattern: More than 3 commits showing clear progression.

dimensions.name: State Management Rigor
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Scan for src/state.py or equivalent. Use AST to find BaseModel/TypedDict. Verify reducers operator.add/ior.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Plain dicts, no Pydantic, no reducers.

dimensions.name: Graph Orchestration Architecture
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Scan src/graph.py for StateGraph builder. Verify parallel fan-out/fan-in for Detectives and Judges.

dimensions.name: Safe Tool Engineering
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Scan src/tools for git clone logic. Verify sandboxing with tempfile, subprocess.run with error handling.
dimensions.success_pattern: Sandboxed git ops, no raw os.system.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Raw os.system clone, no error handling.

dimensions.name: Structured Output Enforcement
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify judges use structured output bound to JudicialOpinion schema.
dimensions.success_pattern: All Judge calls use structured output with validation.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Plain prompts, freeform text, no validation.

dimensions.name: Judicial Nuance and Dialectics
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify distinct prompts for Prosecutor, Defense, TechLead.
dimensions.success_pattern: Three distinct personas with conflicting philosophies.

dimensions.name: Chief Justice Synthesis Engine
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify deterministic conflict resolution rules in ChiefJusticeNode.
dimensions.success_pattern: Hardcoded rules, dissent summary, Markdown output.
dimensions.failure_pattern: LLM averaging, no rules, no dissent.

dimensions.name: Theoretical Depth (Documentation)
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Search PDF for Dialectical Synthesis, Fan-In/Fan-Out, Metacognition, State Synchronization.
dimensions.success_pattern: Terms explained in detail with implementation.

dimensions.name: Report Accuracy (Cross-Reference)
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Cross-reference file paths in PDF with repo evidence.
dimensions.success_pattern: All paths verified, claims match code.

dimensions.name: Architectural Diagram Analysis
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Classify diagrams, verify parallel branches shown.

synthesis_rules.security_override: Confirmed security flaws cap score at 3.
